mapper.select: select count(*) from member where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into member values( #{id}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{jumin1}, #{jumin2}, #{tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reg_date} )
mapper.update: update member set passwd=#{passwd}, name=#{name}, tel=#{tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email=#{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id=#{id}
